actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate regarding global interests in, and responsibility toward, the crisis in Lebanon.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the President should explore: (1) in coordination with other member countries of the multinational force in Lebanon, the formation of a more broadly based force in Lebanon comprised of oil-consuming countries dependent on Middle East oil imports; (2) in discussions with the Soviet Union, the transferral of the peacekeeping responsibilities in Lebanon to a United Nations peacekeeping force or to forces from neutral countries; and (3) replacing the onshore presence of U.S. Marines in Lebanon with U.S. military advisers.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate regarding global interests in, and responsibility toward, the crisis in Lebanon.
